home.description_card: Start using the tools below now to maximize your work efficiency!

check_live_uid.title: Check Facebook UID
check_live_uid.description: Check if a Facebook UID is active.

filter_data_from_content.title: Filter phone and Zalo groups
filter_data_from_content.description: Filter phone numbers and Zalo groups from content

get_otp_2fa.title: Get OTP 2FA
get_otp_2fa.description: Get your two-factor authentication code easily

find_id_facebook.title: Find Facebook ID
find_id_facebook.description: Find Facebook ID from username or profile URL

scan_facebook_group_by_keyword.title: Scan Groups by Keyword
scan_facebook_group_by_keyword.description: Scan Facebook groups based on the keyword you provide.

scan_post_by_keyword.title: Scan Post by Keyword
scan_post_by_keyword.description: Scan Facebook posts based on the keyword you provide.

split_string.title: Split String
split_string.description: Split a string into multiple parts based on a delimiter.

join_string.title: Join String 1
join_string.description: Combine multiple strings into a single string.

join_string_two.title: Join String 2
join_string_two.description: Combine multiple strings into a single string with a custom delimiter.

remove_duplicate.title: Remove Duplicate
remove_duplicate.description: Remove duplicate strings from a list.

token_generator.title: Token generator
token_generator.description: Generate a random string with the characters you want: uppercase or lowercase letters, numbers, and/or symbols.

hash_text.title: Hash text
hash_text.description: Hash a text string using the function you need: MD5, SHA1, SHA256, SHA224, SHA512, SHA384, SHA3, or RIPEMD160.

ulid_generator.title: ULID generator
ulid_generator.description: Generate universally unique lexicographically sortable identifiers

encryption.title: Encrypt / decrypt text
encryption.description: Encrypt and decrypt text using various methods

bip39_generator.title: BIP39 passphrase generator
bip39_generator.description: Generate a BIP39 passphrase from an existing or random mnemonic, or get the mnemonic from the passphrase.

hmac_generator.title: HMAC generator
hmac_generator.description: Computes a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) using a secret key and your favorite hashing function.

rsa_key_pair_generator.title: RSA key pair generator
rsa_key_pair_generator.description: Generate a new random RSA private and public pem certificate key pair.

password_strength_analyser.title: Password strength analyser
password_strength_analyser.description: Discover the strength of your password with this client-side-only password strength analyser and crack time estimation tool.

pdf_signature_checker.title: PDF signature checker
pdf_signature_checker.description: Verify the signatures of a PDF file. A signed PDF file contains one or more signatures that may be used to determine whether the contents of the file have been altered since the file was signed.

date_time.title: Date-time converter
date_time.description: Convert date and time into various formats

integer_base.title: Integer base converter
integer_base.description: Convert integers from one base to another

filter_data.button_check_phone_zalo: Click to find phone numbers and Zalo groups

get_otp_from_2fa.input_label: * 2FA Secret Get code for 2 factor authentication easiest - Please store your 2FA secret safely
get_otp_from_2fa.input_placeholder: Enter your 2FA secret, one per line...

find_id_facebook.title: A free tool to easily get Facebook UID.
find_id_facebook.link_placeholder: Enter the Facebook link to get the ID
find_id_facebook.get_id_error: ID not found or invalid link!

scan_facebook_group.cookie: Cookie (The system guarantees not to store users cookies)

scan_post_by_keyword.cookie: Cookie (The system guarantees not to store users cookies)

join_string.start_join: String to add at the beginning of each line:
join_string.end_join: String to add at the end of each line:

remove_duplicate.input_title: Nhập chuỗi để lọc trùng lặp
remove_duplicate.export_filtered_list: Xuất danh sách đã lọc trùng lặp
remove_duplicate.export_non_duplicate_list: Xuất danh sách không trùng lặp

hmac_generator.plain_text: Plain text to compute the hash

password_strength.crack_time_estimation_note: Estimated time assumes a hacker can try 1 billion passwords per second. Actual time may vary depending on attack methods.
